stories.text: If you were paid to work on open source full time with no strings attached, what would you work on? Would you focus on a particular project? Or on a particular area (like reproducible builds)? And why that project/area?
stories.title: Ask HN: What is your open source dream job?
Grindr fined £5.5m for sharing data for ads

stories.text:
Whenever I search for how to use some library or particular feature on Google, first page will be full of SEO optimized websites with mediocre content. I don't name the sites but while they work, the code doesn't inspire confidence, nor is there proper conceptual explaination.

Are there high quality tutorial sites for general coding or specific areas (web, app dev etc..)?
stories.title: Ask HN: What are some high quality coding tutorial sites?
